ComicInfo.Summary: *Overview* Wayne Tannager seeks Sam & Twitch's help in locating his missing fiance, Gretchen Culver. Elsewhere, the police clear two more serial killer cases from their books when they find the killer sewn up by Suture's handiwork. Mawbley becomes Suture's next victim just as he intends to start a killing spree in a movie theatre. Meanwhile, Sam & Twitch trace Gretchen to an empty grave.
ComicInfo.Title: Blood And Rain
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "Curse of the Spawn" Blood and Sutures
